turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there I'd like a pizza from Papa John's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing what kind do you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmmm I thibk Im gonna go with Johns Special this time, with extra cheese please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and what size did you want it to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra Large definitely.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They actually dont make that pizza that size but it is XL an then you can papa size it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I mean sure I guess thats fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great what toppings did you want on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well extra cheese, pepperoni, green peppers, four cheese blend and bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so thats a extra large johns special with extra cheese, pepperoni, green peppers, four cheese blend, and bacon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great well then your pizza order is complete and the pizza will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great thats not a long time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nah thats pretty quick,actually.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah well thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem and the reciept will be sent to you're phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok thanks again, bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye bye.

items.name: Great well then your pizza order is complete
